name: FLORENCE HOME FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Florence Home Foundation (FHF) was established  by a group of committed and experienced social workers. The goal was to empower the poor to know more to have more to do more for their development in the society. Itâ€™s a non-sectarian, non-political and non-governmental voluntary social service organization.         FHF is a developing organization with more than 20 key members are working in the range of activities like children hostels, supplementary education for school going children in slum area,  health programme in village level, organic farming for income generation and environmental activities like tree planting and nursery raising.
